gameDetails.name: Puzzle Strike: Promo Chips
gameDetails.description:
.

Source: spielbox magazine (2015):

PUZZLE STRIKE is a card game played with cardboard chips rather than cards. It simulates a puzzle video game called 'Puzzle Fighter' that was based on fighting games like Street Fighter.

On this promo board are 3 additional types of Puzzlechips that can be added to the base game.

.

From the Sirlin Games website:

Five copies of each of three new chips, to expand Puzzle Strike's gameplay:

    Combinatorics assists your rushdown.
    Dashing Strike helps you control your pile size while filling your opponent's gem pile.
    Custom Combo is an explosion of 15 actions, enabling insane combos!
